name: Tazar

levels.Ⅳ: :ongoing: For this Combat, your selected [unit](../units/index.md) gains +1 :defense:.
levels.Ⅵ: :effect_map: From your hand, Remove 1 card or Discard 3 cards to draw an [Artifact](../artifacts/index.md) card from the top of the [Artifact](../artifacts/index.md) deck.

notes: **Ⅵ** - The player either removes any 1 card from their hand or they discard 3 cards. In either case, they get to draw the top card of the [Artifact](../artifacts/index.md) deck.
